agePolicy:
Senior tickets are valid for adults 60+.
Child tickets for 2 - 12 years.
Student: Age 13+ with valid student ID.
Not all ticket types are available for all performances.
Rated-R Films: Under 17 requires accompanying parent or adult guardian (age 21 or older).  25 years and under must show ID for rated R movies.

Distraction-Free Entertainment

In an effort to provide the most enjoyable experience for
adults attending R-rated features in the evenings, no
children younger than 6 will be admitted to these
features after 6 p.m

theaterMessage: R – Restricted Movies requires accompanying parent or adult guardian 21 years of age or older for children under 17 years of age. Valid ID will be checked at the box office.

amenities.name: RealD 3D
amenities.description: RealD is the most widely used digital 3D cinema technology.

amenities.name: Closed caption
amenities.description: Closed Captioning devices display a movie's dialogue and sound effects as text; captions are not shown on the main screen.  Devices available by request.

amenities.name: Accessibility devices available
amenities.description: Descriptive Video devices provide audio descriptions of the movie to accommodate the needs of visually impaired guests. Devices available by request.

offer.campaignName: Avengers: Infinity War GWP - FREE FSHOP Poster
offer.label: FREE* EXCLUSIVE POSTER
offer.title: with ticket purchase (S&H not included).
offer.description: Buy tickets to 'Avengers: Infinity War' and choose 1 of 5 FREE* exclusive posters from Fandango FanShop!
offer.termsAndConditions: *PLUS $6.95 STANDARD SHIPPING & HANDLING. Offer is valid from 6:00 a.m. PT on 3/16/2018 through 9:00 a.m. PT on 6/29/2018, subject to ticket availability. Purchase must be made with a Fandango VIP account. Fandango VIP is free to join. Offer valid in the U.S. only to residents 18 years of age or older. Each ‘Avengers: Infinity War’ VIP ticket purchaser on Fandango.com or via the Fandango App, will receive an email with one (1) code ("Code") valid for a FREE ‘Avengers: Infinity Wars’ poster available here: https://www.fandangofanshop.com/avengers-infinity-war-movie-poster (not including shipping and handling) AND 10% discount on all Marvel merchandise on Fandango FanShop, when Code is used during the same transaction. Code is not valid on the purchase of Fandango Passes, gift cards, applicable taxes, or shipping charges. Code can only be used once. One Code per Fandango ticket purchase transaction, regardless of number of tickets purchased in a single transaction. Code expires on 7/31/2018. Codes are available during the offer period while supplies last. This is a promotional code and is not to be shared, is not for resale, has no cash value, and will not be replaced if lost or stolen. This offer is non-transferable and cannot be combined with other offers. This offer is subject to Fandango’s Terms and Policies and Privacy Policy at https://www.fandango.com/terms-and-policies. © 2018 Marvel. All Rights Reserved.
offer.disclaimer: LIMITED TIME. SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY. TERMS APPLY.

offer.termsAndConditions: *PLUS $6.95 STANDARD SHIPPING & HANDLING. Offer is valid from when ‘Ready Player One’ tickets go on pre-sale on Fandango through 9:00 a.m. PT on 5/23/2018, subject to availability. Purchase must be made with a Fandango VIP account. Fandango VIP is free to join. Offer valid in the U.S. only to residents 18 years of age or older. Each ‘Ready Player One’ VIP ticket purchaser on Fandango.com or via the Fandango App, will receive an email with one (1) code ("Code") valid for a FREE ‘’READY PLAYER ONE’ poster available here: https://www.fandangofanshop.com/Ready-Player-One-movie-poster. (not including shipping and handling) AND 10% discount on merchandise on Fandango FanShop, when Code is used during the same transaction. Code is not valid on the purchase of Fandango Passes, gift cards, applicable taxes, or shipping charges. Code can only be used once. One Code per Fandango ticket purchase transaction, regardless of number of tickets purchased in a single transaction. Code expires on 6/11/2018. Codes are available during the offer period while supplies last. This is a promotional code and is not to be shared, is not for resale, has no cash value, and will not be replaced if lost or stolen. This offer is non-transferable and cannot be combined with other offers. This offer is subject to Fandango’s Terms and Policies and Privacy Policy at https://www.fandango.com/terms-and-policies. © WBEI. All Rights Reserved.

agePolicy:
Child tickets are valid for children aged 3 - 12 years.

Senior pricing may vary for each location. Please see Box Office Information for more details.

Student and Military discounts are also available at some locations with valid ID - please inquire at theatre box office.

Must be 21 or older to enjoy the CinéBistro in-theatre experience at select locations. Please check specific theatre pages for more information. Proper ID required. Grove 16 Restaurant is open to all ages.

agePolicy:
Child tickets are valid for children 11 years and younger. Senior tickets are valid for adults 62 years and older. Student tickets require a valid student ID to be presented at the box office and/or entrance to theater auditorium. Not all ticket types are available at all theatres or for all performances.

No Children Under Age 6 Will Be Admitted To Any R-Rated Feature After 6:00 PM. Valid IDs will be required to attend Rated "R" movies. You must be at least 17 years of age or have your parent accompany you to view the movie. IDs will be checked at the theater.

offer.termsAndConditions: *PLUS $6.95 STANDARD SHIPPING & HANDLING. Each ‘Ready Player One’ VIP ticket purchaser on Fandango.com or via the Fandango App, will receive an email with one (1) code ("Code") valid for a FREE ‘’READY PLAYER ONE’ poster available here: https://www.fandangofanshop.com/Ready-Player-One-movie-poster. (not including shipping and handling) AND 10% discount on merchandise on Fandango FanShop, when Code is used during the same transaction. Code is not valid on the purchase of Fandango Passes, gift cards, applicable taxes, or shipping charges. Code can only be used once. One Code per Fandango ticket purchase transaction, regardless of number of tickets purchased in a single transaction. Code expires on 6/11/2018. Codes are available during the offer period while supplies last. This is a promotional code and is not to be shared, is not for resale, has no cash value, and will not be replaced if lost or stolen. agePolicy:
Senior tickets are valid for adults 60+.
Child tickets for 2 - 12 years.
Student: Age 13+ with valid student ID.
Not all ticket types are available for all performances.
Rated-R Films: Under 17 requires accompanying parent or adult guardian (age 21 or older).  25 years and under must show ID for rated R movies.

Distraction-Free Entertainment

In an effort to provide the most enjoyable experience for
adults attending R-rated features in the evenings, no
children younger than 6 will be admitted to these
features after 6 p.m

Each ‘Avengers: Infinity War’ VIP ticket purchaser on Fandango.com or via the Fandango App, will receive an email with one (1) code ("Code") valid for a FREE ‘Avengers: Infinity Wars’ poster available here: https://www.fandangofanshop.com/avengers-infinity-war-movie-poster (not including shipping and handling) AND 10% discount on all Marvel merchandise on Fandango FanShop, when Code is used during the same transaction. Code is not valid on the purchase of Fandango Passes, gift cards, applicable taxes, or shipping charges. Code can only be used once. One Code per Fandango ticket purchase transaction, regardless of number of tickets purchased in a single transaction. Code expires on 7/31/2018. Codes are available during the offer period while supplies last. This is a promotional code and is not to be shared, is not for resale, has no cash value, and will not be replaced if lost or stolen. This offer is non-transferable and cannot be combined with other offers. This offer is subject to Fandango’s Terms and Policies and Privacy Policy at https://www.fandango.com/terms-and-policies. © 2018 Marvel. All Rights Reserved.
offer.disclaimer: LIMITED TIME. SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY. TERMS APPLY.
